channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Popup Maker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Popup Maker

item.title: CVE-2022-4362|2024-08-03T01:34:50.159Z -- unknown -- popup%20maker
item.description: The Popup Maker WordPress plugin before 1.16.9 does not validate and escape one of its shortcode attributes, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2022-4381|2024-08-03T01:41:44.631Z -- unknown -- popup%20maker
item.description: The Popup Maker WordPress plugin before 1.16.9 does not validate and escape one of its shortcode attributes, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2022-3690|2024-08-03T01:14:03.298Z -- unknown -- popup%20maker
item.description: The Popup Maker WordPress plugin before 1.16.11 does not sanitise and escape some of its Popup options, which could allow users with a role as low as Contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks, which could be used against admins
